ygData.msgSnippet: Liono sees the lovers as he walks down the hallway and thinks its moments like these I miss Keyura I wonder where she is. Holds the Locket and the Holocube she

Liono sees the lovers as he walks down the hallway and thinks its moments 
like these I miss Keyura I wonder where she is. Holds the Locket and the 
Holocube she gave him. As he enters the weapon room "I hate blasters relics 
of an Archaic age if only I could find something better." Liono  picks up the 
Lion's Claw and attaches the twin pulse Cannon to forearm and loads Chaingun 
in the Lion's mouth in the center of his chest. Liono exits the weapon room 
sealing it with his private code forbidding entry to those that lack his 
code. Liono enters his chamber goes to the back wall where grabs his Sword 
from its case. 

Tigerhawk sits in the secure sector hard at work on the on the Terra Star as 
he installs the lends and defense/heat shielding plate. He continues to weld 
the plates on with a torch.  

Liono exits chamber as he scans for the other signatures starts racing 
throughout the hallways. As Liono arrives at the corner before the others can 
see him and places a small transparent cube on the ceiling and waits until 
Prowl and Iron pass by and A Liono slides out Cutting off Plissanta and Crew. 
" I'm asking you nicely to leave."
((The Liono at the corner is a Hologram))
